long_description: The lightweight, waterproof Marmot PreCip(R) Baseball Cap keeps you warm and dry when the rain falls. Waterproof, breathable NanoPro(TM) provides excellent protection while allowing moisture vapor to escape; NanoPro is more breathable than previous Marmot coating technology. Breathable polyester mesh lining wicks away moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Brushed polyester headband has the soft feel of flannel and traps warmth; it also helps manage moisture for comfort. The Marmot PreCip Baseball Cap has a rip-and-stick closure in back to fine-tune the fit.
short_description: The lightweight, waterproof Marmot PreCip(R) Baseball Cap keeps you warm and dry when the rain falls.
